document_data.mainbody:
Blind Ippsley was a merchant and vendor that lived in Helms Hold during the late 15 century DR.
During the Siege of Helms Hold in the , Ippsley set up shop in the Old Dirty Dwarf inn. He offered a variety of useful items that benefited the adventuring types frequenting the inn while trying to help Helms Hold with his horrific devil situation.
